name: Blast Zone (SaintofBloodPL)
description:
Blast Zone is an explosive team-based game that challenges you to plant bombs at your opponent's bomb site. With its strategic gameplay and maze-like obstacles, you'll need to think fast and act even faster to outwit your opponents. So, gather your team and get ready for an action-packed adventure in Blast Zone! 

Blast Zone was made by a team of five talented individuals: Andrea, Luqi, Michal, XiaoLiang, and Yiling.  

Sound Credits: Free Music, LonePeakMusic GFX Sounds, Sound Effect King, Creator Assets, SnapSound, FreeSound.Org, and Sfxr.me
